name: Return to Terok Nor
description: Years after it became Deep Space Nine, the space station struggles to shake its dark past. But are the ghosts roaming from Promenade to pylon merely traces of a painful past, or a more concrete threat, one steeped in revenge?
rules:
-- In a Voyage Event, you will engage in Voyages with ocassional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- In this event, Gold and Silver skills for Voyages will be DIP and SEC. 
-- Voyage Encounters take place at the following points in time: 1 minute, 5 minutes, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 45 minutes, 1 hour, 1.5 hours, 2 hours, and every 2 hours after that.
-- Passing a Voyage Encounter without losing any contests raises the multiplier for Victory Points gained in contests. Losing a contest resets this multiplier.
-- Three of the following traits are randomly chosen for each Encounter: Inspiring, Explorer, Scoundrel, Casual, Playful, Hero, Marksman, Investigator. Using crew with matching traits increases their Crit Chance in contests.
-- Using any version of Pallra, Damar, Solbor, Cardassians, or Bajorans will provide a bonus to antimatter and a permanent multiplier to passively gained Victory Points.
-- Using the Cardassian Keldon Class, the U.S.S. Raging Queen, the Val Jean, or ships with the Battlecruiser trait will provide a bonus to antimatter.
-- Earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters. The amount you earn increases with every Voyage Encounter passed. 
-- Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Battlescruiser (Ship trait), Pallra, Damar, Solbor, Cardassians, or Bajorans

featured_crew.name: Minuet
featured_crew.flavor: It's a sad realization that your child and the wife holding a birthday cake for you are just a hologram.

featured_crew.name: Damar
featured_crew.flavor: Damar’s dedication to Cardassia came into conflict with his devotion to his mentor Dukat, whose own aims were coming into question.

action.name: I Demand To Know Where We Are Going

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Damar
rewards.flavor: First seen aboard the freighter Groumall, Damar served as Dukat's second-in-command across multiple assignments.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: B. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Basic Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

ship.name: Val Jean
ship.flavor: A Maquis raider commanded by Chakotay. This vessel was destroyed after colliding with the Caretaker's array.

ship.name: Cardassian Keldon Class
ship.flavor: A Cardassian warship used during the 24th century, some of which were secretly enhanced with cloaking under the Obsidian Order and the Romulan Tal Shiar.

ship.name: U.S.S. Raging Queen
ship.flavor: A Curry-type medium battlecruiser operated by Starfleet in the 24th century that fought in the early part of the Dominion War.

rewards.name: Crew Refresh
rewards.flavor: Use to refresh crew in Voyage Encounters or Specialist Event Missions.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Minuet
rewards.flavor: It's a sad realization that your child and the wife holding a birthday cake for you are just a hologram.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Minuet
rewards.flavor: It's a sad realization that your child and the wife holding a birthday cake for you are just a hologram.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

screens.text: "In spite of all you have done to make this space station a vibrant hub, Colonel, I must confess I can never feel comfortable here. For me, the pain and torment of those who suffered here still pervades these halls."

"I understand what you mean. Despite all we've overcome, the years I've spent on Deep Space Nine have held many heartbreaking revelations. This place was filled with so much darkness, darkness only light could ever hope to drive out."
"If it pains you that much, then why not return Terok Nor to the Cardassians to whom it belonged in the first place?"

"So, you want the station back? The same one you abandoned? Well, I suppose that explains all of our strange occurrences lately. Captain, think you can help shed some light on the shadows of our past?"

"In spite of all you have done to make this space station a vibrant hub, Colonel, I must confess I can never feel comfortable here. For me, the pain and torment of those who suffered here still pervades these halls."

"I understand what you mean. Despite all we've overcome, the years I've spent on Deep Space Nine have held many heartbreaking revelations. This place was filled with so much darkness, darkness only light could ever hope to drive out."
"If it pains you that much, then why not return Terok Nor to the Cardassians to whom it belonged in the first place?"

"So, you want the station back? The same one you abandoned? Well, I suppose that explains all of our strange occurrences lately. Captain, think you can help shed some light on the shadows of our past?"
